content: CEV’s NFE improved by $3.5 million, primarily due to increased revenue from the sale of SREC and higher electricity prices in the first quarter of fiscal 2022. So, in terms of revenue for the AMA, you should expect and you have that in that presentation towards the end that we’re going to recognize for the year about $52 million in revenues of which we have recognized already $22 million, and the difference is going to recognize -- is going to be recognized pro rata over the next three quarters.
